attributes.action: stop companies from making the customer pay their bank charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the prime minister to stop companies passing on their bank charges to the customer, its usually theatres and airlines that do this, you will see when they ask you how you would like to pay,Credit Card £1.50, electron £1.50 etc etc, its criminal, the customer who has no choice in how he is paid is basically over a barrel.They should not be able to get away with it especially in the present climate.
